post:
ControlVM Technology provide comprehensive, wide range and affordable virtual private servers (VPS) hosting with well known virtualization technology such as OpenVZ, Xen, Xen HVM, and KVM. No matter use for Enterprise shared / reseller hosting, telephony system such as Hosted PBX or VoIP VPS, VPN, intranet, Monitoring Server, DNS server, Simulation / Application server or Backup Server, we have the right solutions that suite your needs. Currently we are serving customers from more than 30 countries and managing servers in 5 data centers in 3 continents.

●●● Standard Features

  • FREE DNS Hosting (Geographical Distributed DNS Servers)
  • Proactive Ping Monitoring
  • SolusVM Control Panel
  • Available in Los Angeles, Phoenix, Germany

#############################################

●●● Info:
We are not reseller. We have our own facilities in Malaysia and Singapore Data Center. All servers are managed by our own.
We don't oversell our VPS node. Stability and client's satisfaction always our priority. KVM or Xen setup with SolusVM, non-oversell business model.
Why price so low? Just because we have redundant resources!
